医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的人工智能工具绘制了数百万个 CD8+ T 细胞的图谱，以推进疾病研究scAtlasVAE 模型整合 scRNA-seq 数据来创建 CD8+ T 细胞图谱，增强对炎症和癌症免疫反应的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-AI-tool-maps-millions-of-CD82b-T-cells-to-advance-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/New-AI-tool-maps-millions-of-CD82b-T-cells-to-advance-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=898c4397-1f47-44dd-ae5a-4bb4efa5d04b Wed, 04 Dec 2024 09:07:00 -0500 New AI tool maps millions of CD8+ T cells to advance disease research
SRF 授予 230,000 美元拨款以推进 SYNGAP1 相关疾病的研究SynGAP 研究基金 (SRF) 向杰克逊实验室罕见疾病转化中心提供了 230,000 美元的资助，用于表征 SYNGAP1 相关疾病 (SRD) 的小鼠模型，SRD 是一种严重的神经发育障碍，以癫痫、智力障碍、运动和行为障碍为特征。挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/SRF-awards-24230000-grant-to-advance-research-on-SYNGAP1-Related-Disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/SRF-awards-24230000-grant-to-advance-research-on-SYNGAP1-Related-Disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e9e1b2c-0be3-472a-9016-f16541e7a50a Wed, 04 Dec 2024 09:03:31 -0500 SRF awards $230,000 grant to advance research on SYNGAP1-Related Disorders
童年接触含铅汽油与精神疾病和性格改变有关《儿童心理学和精神病学杂志》上发表的新研究表明，由于汽油中使用铅，大多数工业化国家的儿童铅暴露在 1960 年至 1990 年间达到顶峰，对心理健康产生了负面影响，并可能导致许多精神疾病和精神疾病病例。改变了性格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childhood-exposure-to-leaded-gasoline-linked-to-mental-illness-and-personality-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Childhood-exposure-to-leaded-gasoline-linked-to-mental-illness-and-personality-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ff1586c-a92a-464e-bbaf-4da435fef1b6 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 08:14:07 -0500 Childhood exposure to leaded gasoline linked to mental illness and personality changes
研究揭示了早期检测脓毒症的非侵入性技术临床医生缺乏早期发现脓毒症的方法，脓毒症是一种对感染的失调反应，如果治疗延迟，可能会导致危及生命的器官衰竭。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Study-reveals-non-pressive-technique-for-early-detection-of-sepsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Study-reveals-non-pressive-technique-for-early-detection-of-sepsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d0f4f0b-853d-416c-83f2-306a7a146282 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 08:00:58 -0500 Study reveals non-invasive technique for early detection of sepsis
如果特朗普削减医疗补助资金，9个州准备终止数百万人的医疗保险随着唐纳德·特朗普重返白宫以及共和党人于 2025 年完全控制国会，《平价医疗法案》的医疗补助扩张又重新陷入困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/9-states-poished-to-end-coverage-for-millions-if-trump-cuts-Medicaid-funding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/9-states-poished-to-end-coverage-for-millions-if-trump-cuts-Medicaid-funding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04efd6d1-5bff-4f19-a0ae-3d2e2f3bf950 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 07:54:00 -0500 9 states poised to end coverage for millions if Trump cuts Medicaid funding
疗养院在为患者接种新冠疫苗方面落后住在匹兹堡郊外的疗养院助理莫利·洛夫兰 (Mollee Loveland) 说，似乎没有人再认真对待 covid-19 了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Nursing-homes-fell-behind-on-vaccinating-病人-for-covid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Nursing-homes-fell-behind-on-vaccinating-病人-for-covid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1f79f20-d188-4cbf-9519-85c1a4c92c8f Wed, 04 Dec 2024 07:53:00 -0500 Nursing homes fell behind on vaccinating patients for covid
青少年的长期新冠病毒在两年内表现出显着改善伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，大多数在 PCR 检测呈阳性三个月后被确认患有长期新冠肺炎的年轻人都在 24 个月内康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Long-Covid-in-teenagers-shows-significant-improvement-within-two-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Long-Covid-in-teenagers-shows-significant-improvement-within-two-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3905ec4e-d926-4101-aa7f-22c40b04ff71 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 07:23:31 -0500 Long Covid in teenagers shows significant improvement within two years
癌症治疗可能会破坏动脉的免疫调节，从而增加心脏病和中风的风险免疫检查点抑制剂可能会通过改变动脉粥样硬化斑块中的免疫相互作用来增加心血管风险，特别是在糖尿病患者中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Cancer-therapy-may-raise-heart-attack-and-中风-risks-by-disrupting-immune-regulation-in-arteries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/Cancer-therapy-may-raise-heart-attack-and-中风-risks-by-disrupting-immune-regulation-in-arteries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2896f8f4-eb2e-472a-8b99-f04c0c33467d Wed, 04 Dec 2024 07:06:00 -0500 Cancer therapy may raise heart attack and stroke risks by disrupting immune regulation in arteries
evitria 与 Sapio Sciences 合作简化抗体工作流程管理和报告science-aware™ 实验室信息学平台 Sapio Sciences 今天宣布，抗体表达服务领域的领导者 evitria 已选择 Sapio 的电子实验室笔记本 (ELN) 和 Sapio Report Builder 来增强其样本跟踪、数据捕获和报告功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/evitria-partners-with-Sapio-Sciences-to-streamline-antibody-workflow-management-and-reporting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241204/evitria-partners-with-Sapio-Sciences-to-streamline-antibody-workflow-management-and-reporting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8e3f82a-e208-4493-808f-a87bc3f30d43 Wed, 04 Dec 2024 06:45:00 -0500 evitria partners with Sapio Sciences to streamline antibody workflow management and reporting
